title: Ticket #871: condor_q -xml -format changed behavior
description:
Upon upgrading to a pre-release of 7.4.0, CMS found that the behavior of the following query changed in a way that broke the prodAgent instance serving the OSG: 

condor_q -xml -format "%s" Attr1+Attr2+Attr3

Prior to 7.3.2, the behavior of the above query was to produce xml output including all of the specified attributes (plus a few others that were always there by mistake/default). In 7.3.2 and the current pre-release of 7.4.0, the effect was to output an empty ad.

The workaround is to query in 7.4.0 using the new syntax: 

condor_q -xml -attributes Attr1,Attr2,Attr3

but this does no work with older condor versions.

A different workaround is to use multiple -format specifications: 

condor_q -xml -format "%s" Attr1 -format "%s" Attr2 -format "%s" Attr3

However, this change in behavior was not intentional and could cause problems for more people. I am making a patch that fixes it. I would like to get this into 7.4.0 so that there is no stable series version with the changed behavior.
remarks: The decision was to push this patch in 7.4.1.
